reviews.text:
Although we were a big family with 4 kids, including infants, this hotel located in the middle of local shopping and just near Tuileries Gardens did super good sharing all its resources with us.
Personnel was very attentive and we had fun staying there, in a location very good for walking.
We tried the restaurant within the hotel, and all enjoyed a lot of- both food and service.
Very rich breakfasts too.
The only thing is non-spacious rooms for quite some money, but this is quite natural for Paris in general, especially for locations neighboring with top-brands-boutiques!

Stayed for our anniversary 20 years after our first visit to Paris and the hotel is incredible. Lovely touches in the room and breakfast was so good. Most of all of you get to meet beryl on reception count yourself lucky. She is a real credit to the hotel... Just wish we could afford to come back again......

Very charming and welcoming hotel in a very ritzy area. The hotel staff has been nothing but helpful and friendly, from the reception, to the concierge, to the bar tender and everyone in between. Plus getting to play with the two resident cats is a treat on its own. We will definitely be back next time we come to Paris. Their breakfast buffet and amenities are also top notch.

My Paris dreams came true during our stay at Castille. We were blown away by our room; it was absolutely stunning and chic. The French windows, pillow menu, wonderful aroma throughout the hotel, delicious chips, and endless treats made our experience unforgettable. We had an incredible stay at Castille and would definitely come back. Highly recommend it if youâ€™re visiting Paris!

Cute hotel in a great location, but not quite what I would consider 5 star. Despite advertising 24 hour room service, that was not the case, no hair conditioner in the room until my 2nd day, very basic mini bar and cold coffee being served at breakfast were some examples of where this hotel fell short of 5 stars to me. All that said, nice staff, good sized rooms and great location.
